overview: Diaphane was filmed (super8) on January 27, 2018 from 8:08 am to 12:34 pm. The film is a filmed portrait of the village of Saint-Loup-de-Varenne, a small village where the first photograph was taken by Nicéphore Niepce (Point de vue du Gras, 1827, Saint Loup-de-Varennes, 16.2 × 20 , 2 cm.)  The film begins with a sunrise which will reveal the entire village.
title: Diaphane, January 27, 2018, 8:08 a.m. / 12:34 p.m., Saint-Loup-de-Varennes, France
